meanings.definition: Bacteria that convert lactose into lactic acid.
meanings.sent1: Lactobacilli help in turning lactose into lactic acid.
meanings.sent2: Yogurt contains lactobacilli that change lactose to lactic acid.
meanings.sent3: The lactobacilli in the yogurt party all night turning lactose into lactic acid.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny chefs, lactobacilli cook up lactic acid from lactose.
meanings.sent5: Imagine lactobacilli as little lactose-eating machines producing lactic acid.

meanings.definition: A type of probiotic bacteria found in fermented foods like yogurt.
meanings.sent1: Fermented foods like yogurt have lactobacilli, which are good bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Yogurt is full of lactobacilli, which are beneficial for health.
meanings.sent3: The lactobacilli in yogurt are like tiny superheroes fighting for gut health.
meanings.sent4: Lactobacilli in yogurt are like friendly helpers keeping our gut happy.
meanings.sent5: Think of lactobacilli as the guardians of gut health found in yogurt.

meanings.sent1: Eating foods with lactobacilli can improve gut health.
meanings.sent2: Lactobacilli are tiny organisms that support a healthy gut.
meanings.sent3: The lactobacilli in your belly are like little gardeners tending to your gut.
meanings.sent4: Lactobacilli are the friendly neighbors in your gut community promoting health.
meanings.sent5: Visualize lactobacilli as tiny health warriors fighting for your gut's well-being.
